name: tk
description: Token-optimized commands for Claude Code. Combines patterns from Get Shit Done, Ralph, and Anthropic plugins with ~78% fewer tokens.
author: colbywest5

commands.name: tk:map
commands.description: Map project and create context (AGENTS.md, .planning/). Run this first.

commands.name: tk:build
commands.description: Build features using 7-phase workflow with optional parallel agents

commands.name: tk:design
commands.description: Create distinctive frontend interfaces - no generic AI aesthetics

commands.name: tk:debug
commands.description: Systematic debugging with hypothesis testing and auto-revert

commands.name: tk:qa
commands.description: QA testing with security vulnerability scanning

commands.name: tk:clean
commands.description: Cleanup codebase - dead code, unused deps, refactoring

commands.name: tk:doc
commands.description: Generate documentation - README, API docs, architecture

commands.name: tk:deploy
commands.description: Deploy with pre-flight checks and post-deploy verification

commands.name: tk:init
commands.description: Initialize new project with preferred stack

commands.name: tk:opinion
commands.description: Get honest project audit with actionable feedback

commands.name: tk:rules
commands.description: Set global rules for all TK agents (no emojis, no placeholders, etc.)

commands.name: tk:update
commands.description: Update TK to the latest version from GitHub

modes.light: Fast execution, minimal questions, no SubAgents
modes.heavy: Full workflow with parallel SubAgents + DOCS agent
